get.description: Standard implementation of the OAI-PMH protocol with HTTP GET method

post.description: Standard implementation of the OAI-PMH protocol with HTTP POST method

parameters.name: si
parameters.description: The start index of the first result set item, starting from 1

parameters.name: ct
parameters.description: Maximum number of datasets in each page of the result set

parameters.name: st
parameters.description: One or more search terms; in case of multiple search terms they must be separated by 'AND' or 'OR'

parameters.name: sources
parameters.description: Comma separated list of DAB sources identifiers

parameters.name: parents
parameters.description: Comma separated list of datasets identifiers

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: A dataset identifier

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: A search keyword

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: A dataset format

parameters.name: protocol
parameters.description: A dataset protocol

parameters.name: searchFields
parameters.description: A single search field or a comma separated list of search fields in which to perform the terms search

parameters.name: tf
parameters.description: Term frequency

parameters.name: sscScore
parameters.description: The Service Status Checker range (e.g,: [0,20])

parameters.name: ts
parameters.description: Time start. Date or datetime expressed in ISO8601 format (e.g.: '2015-01-01', '2015-01-01'T00:00:00Z )'

parameters.name: te
parameters.description: Time end. Date or datetime expressed in ISO8601 format (e.g.: '2015-01-01', '2015-01-01'T00:00:00Z )'

parameters.name: bbox
parameters.description: A bounding box (expressed in EPSG:4326) which includes the search results. Comma separated list of values: west,south,east,north

parameters.name: instrumentId
parameters.description: Instrument identifier

parameters.name: instrumentDesc
parameters.description: Instrument description

parameters.name: platformId
parameters.description: Platform identifier

parameters.name: platformDesc
parameters.description: Platform description

parameters.name: origOrgId
parameters.description: Originator organisation identifier

parameters.name: attributeId
parameters.description: Attribute identifier

parameters.name: attributeDesc
parameters.description: Attribute description

parameters.name: origOrgDesc
parameters.description: Originator organisation description

parameters.name: rosetta
parameters.description: Rosetta

parameters.name: outputFormat
parameters.description: The output format

post.description: Supported operations: GetRecords, GetCapabilities, DescribeRecord, GetRecordById

get.summary: HIS Central Get Water One Flow Service Info

get.description: Gets available series according to the specified constraints.

parameters.name: xmin
parameters.description: BBOX west value.

parameters.name: xmax
parameters.description: BBOX east value

parameters.name: ymin
parameters.description: BBOX south value.

parameters.name: ymax
parameters.description: BBOX north value.

parameters.name: conceptKeyword
parameters.description: Search keyword.

parameters.name: networkIDs
parameters.description: Network identifiers

parameters.name: beginDate
parameters.description: Begin date

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: End date

get.summary: REST Discovery statistics interface for GEOSS Portal

parameters.name: statistic
parameters.description: The required statistic. The following statistics 'mostPopularDiscoveryServices', 'mostPopularResources', 'mostPopularCatalogs', 'mostPopularOrg' are applied to all the catalogs, so they are available only when the 'catalog' parameter is left blank. The other statistics  are always available, both when the 'catalog' parameter is set and when it's left blank

parameters.name: origin
parameters.description: Comma separated list of server names which executed the queries generating the interested statistics

parameters.name: period
parameters.description: Predefined analyzed period. If the period is set, the parameters 'periodRangeStart' and 'periodRangeEnd' must be left blank

parameters.name: periodRangeStart
parameters.description: Start of analyzed period. If the period is set, the parameter 'period' must be left blank

parameters.name: periodRangeEnd
parameters.description: End of analyzed period. This optional parameter can be set only if also the 'periodRangeStart' is set

parameters.name: interval
parameters.description: Interval of the statistics results. Useful only if the selected statistic is 'numberOfSearches', for all other statistics this parameter can be left blank (otherwise is ignored)

parameters.name: intervalSize
parameters.description: Size of the interval expressed by the the 'interval' parameter. Useful only if the selected statistic is 'numberOfSearches', for all other statistics this parameter can be left blank (otherwise is ignored)

parameters.name: catalog
parameters.description: A catalog target of a selected statistic. May be omitted to target all catalogs

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: Maximum number of presented results, ignored for the 'numberOfSearches' statistic

get.summary: REST Access statistics interface for GEOSS Portal

parameters.name: statistic
parameters.description: The required statistic

parameters.name: origin
parameters.description: Comma separated list of server names which executed the queries generating the interested statistics

parameters.name: period
parameters.description: Predefined analyzed period. If the period is set, the parameters 'periodRangeStart' and 'periodRangeEnd' must be left blank

parameters.name: periodRangeStart
parameters.description: Start of analyzed period. If the period is set, the parameter 'period' must be left blank

parameters.name: periodRangeEnd
parameters.description: End of analyzed period. This optional parameter can be set only if also the 'periodRangeStart' is set

parameters.name: interval
parameters.description: Interval of the statistics results. Useful only if the selected statistic is 'numberOfAccessRequests', for all other statistics this parameter can be left blank (otherwise is ignored)

parameters.name: intervalSize
parameters.description: Size of the interval expressed by the the 'interval' parameter. Useful only if the selected statistic is 'numberOfAccessRequests', for all other statistics this parameter can be left blank (otherwise is ignored)

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: Maximum number of presented results, ignored for the 'numberOfAccessRequests' statistic
